doc.title: 5 Freshman Fantasies: Self Satisfaction
doc.plot: Nick Steel starts the movie off by having phone sex. The second scene shows Peter Wilder satisfying himself by the swimming pool. Then the viewer is treated to Dante who takes a bubble bath for the camera and finishes his scene in his bed. Shawn Young entertains in scene four by inviting the viewer into his bedroom. Leo DeSilva closes the film by working himself up in front of a bungalow.

Then the viewer is treated to Dante who takes a bubble bath for the camera and finishes his scene in his bed. Shawn Young entertains in scene four by inviting the viewer into his bedroom.
